reviewText: Puppetolio is good old-fashioned fun. Steve Meltzer and his puppets entertain children and adults alike.  This has remained one of my boys' favorite videos for the past 3 years.  Both boys have seen the live show, and they continue to laugh at the video.  I enjoy having it on because of the squeals of delight that fill my house when my kids are watching it.  In this world of battery-operated, over-stimulating toys, this is a breath of fresh air.
